dmca.title: [ABUSE] Illegal Distribution of Autodesk Products
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, December 25, 2005 11:28 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal Distribution of Autodesk Products]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Illegal Distribution of Autodesk Products
Date: Fri, 23 Dec 2005 10:42:41 -0500
From: Katz Louis <end-fraud0@lycos.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: end-fraiud0@lycos.com

Hi,
Illegal copies of Autodesk Products are being distributed from your servers
using the urls:
http://70.86.199.18/~oddity/?url=KDU2M35qaSs9KiEyYj47PSAwISA8OiUjMTc9dT8yM3A
eCBEWBgQUFEcOCwcYCB0bXx4GGxEHWUdXDQw2KhsLMxktB3YRLHImZzE/InsjLyYiNDtnPzwjIzB
vEDo5MzlpDAgHUAoEDwUJRhhGDR8KX0ZfABIG

and

http://70.86.199.18/~oddity/?url=KDU2M35qaTckLDIiYj47PSAwISA8OiUjMTc9dT8yM3A
eAAZSXVxfBUcNAwUDQgMKFBgTXBAQE0QPHE06FAdJLCguOiohNnIzZzolJCE4fSA4Fjo6OyU%2BY
igxMzU7cgkwDAcQAglLNAIbDAsZDwVAIhEFGhYZFAIeGxhUDUlTTFHw74utp6nojK2wp6qnqLzhg
pSTl/qbkJj1mJ2atZPwrYGT

These urls are being publicized at the internet site:
http://ewares.org/news.php?extend.3274

This information has been shared with the piracy monitoring section of the
Autodesk website and that of the BSA.

These links are functional at a data rate of approx. 600 mbs.
Yours truly,



- --
_______________________________________________

Search for businesses by name, location, or phone number.  -Lycos Yellow
Pages

http://r.lycos.com/r/yp_emailfooter/http://yellowpages.lycos.com/default.asp
?SRC=lycos10
